pullrequest.title: Feature System Part 6: Features for constructing objects from SDF data

content.raw: And as the `ign-physics` API continues to mature, we'll gradually have core API features that can be used as alternatives to the `SDF`-based construction. We’ll also be able to provide helper classes so that physics engines that provide the core construction features are able to get the SDF-based construction features practically for free.
content.html: And as the ign-physics API continues to mature, we'll gradually have core API features that can be used as alternatives to the SDF-based construction. We’ll also be able to provide helper classes so that physics engines that provide the core construction features are able to get the SDF-based construction features practically for free.
